did.unittitle: Louisa S. Janvier to A. Frederic Gronberg 1929 September 11

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Louisa S. Janvier to A. Frederic Gronberg, Accession #7746-b, Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred from the University of Virginia Library Rare Books Division on October 15, 1968.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Promises to send him soon a poem popular during the Civil War written by her husband who was a cousin of Thomas Allibone Janvier; Gronberg, owner of a bookstore in San Diego, Calif., met Louisa Janvier, by chance, in the book store "several years ago."

did.unittitle: Louisa S. Janvier to A. Frederic Gronberg 1929 Sep 11

scopecontent.p: Promises to send him soon a poem popular during the Civil War written by her husband who was a cousin of Thomas Allibone Janvier; Gronberg, owner of a bookstore in San Diego, Calif., met Louisa Janvier, by chance, in the book store "several years ago."
